kpi.name: M1005C183

kpi_info.title: RL SETUP FAIL FOR SHO ON SRNC DUE TO MISC CAUSE
kpi_info.use: A number of radio link setup failures for soft handover on SRNC due to miscellaneous cause. UPDATED:When a common NBAP signalling entity receives a NBAP:RADIO LINK SETUP FAILURE message from a BTS.

kpi.kpi_alias: RL SETUP FAIL FOR SHO ON SRNC DUE TO MISC CAUSE
